element-citation.article-title: Improving performance of perovskite solar cells using [7]helicenes with stable partial biradical characters as the hole-extraction layers

ref.mixed-citation: Lee, C.-C., Chen, C.-I., Fang, C.-T., Huang, P.-Y., Wu, Y.-T., and Chueh, C.-C. (2019). Improving performance of perovskite solar cells using [7]helicenes with stable partial biradical characters as the hole-extraction layers. Adv. Funct. Mater. 29, 1808625.
